text: Yara bhaya karato tadera madhyera dujana loka -- yadera upare allah anugraha karechilena, tara balale -- ''tadera upare dhuke paro daraja diye, kaje'i yakhana tomara tate prabesa karabe tomara takhana niscaya'i bijayi habe, ara allah‌ra upare tabe tomara nirbhara karo, yadi tomara mumina ha'o.’’
